message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique benefits and potential for you, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,350,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $1,200,000. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about we settle on $1,275,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I am comfortable with a price of $1,225,000.
